    • Method Detail

      • prevalidateRule

        public void prevalidateRule(MonitoringRule targetRule,
                   Collection<MonitoringRule> existingMonitoringRules)
                     throws RuleValidationException
        Validate the entire targetRule against the existingMonitoringRules. The targetRule must not be part of the existingMonitoringRules. If the rule is already part of existingMonitoringRules use postvalidateRule(MonitoringRule, MonitoringRules) instead.
        Parameters:
        targetRule - The rule to be validated
        existingMonitoringRules - The already defined rules
        Throws:
        RuleValidationException - If the rule is not valid. Information about the error can be retrieved from the exception message

      • prevalidateRule

                     throws RuleValidationException
        Throws:
        RuleValidationException
